parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=coderfoundry.cloudapp.net,55555; Initial Catalog=cgrimmett-shoppingapp; User ID=cgrimmett; Password=Chris407; Persist Security Info=True; Connection Timeout=30; TrustServerCertificate=True;

parameter.name: Search-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: Search Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
